Function Documentation

ActivationFunction * ANN::getActivationFunctionByTypeString ( const char *  str)

Auxiliar function to build ActivationFunction objects.

Auxiliar function to build an ActivationFunction instance from its name string (as a char*). It only works on simple activation functions that doesn't have parametrized constructor.

References ERROR_EXIT1.

Referenced by ANN::AllAllMLP::generateActionsAllAll().

ActivationFunction * ANN::getActivationFunctionByTypeString ( const constString &  str)

Auxiliar function to build ActivationFunction objects.

Auxiliar function to build an ActivationFunction instance from its name string (as a constString&). It only works on simple activation functions that doesn't have parametrized constructor.

References ERROR_EXIT.
